definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: Papa would bring an old battered coal shovel and an old-fashioned ice chest with him.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷总会带来一把破旧的煤铲和一台老式冰柜。

sentences.english: Seventy-five years after Mrs. Graham's cat fell into the freezer.
sentences.chinese: 在格雷厄姆太太的猫掉进冰柜七十五年之后。

sentences.english: Forklifts are another problem with ordinary freezers .
sentences.chinese: 叉车是另一个问题，与普通冰柜。

sentences.english: In front of the deep-freeze they found a small pool of water.
sentences.chinese: 他们在冰柜前发现了一小滩水。

sentences.english: Consider passing on old freezers and refrigerators.
sentences.chinese: 在遇到旧的电冰箱或冰柜时，考虑不买。

sentences.english: An ice chest with a small amount of ice performs this function well.
sentences.chinese: 一个冰柜与小量的冰很好执行这个作用。

sentences.english: Our snow seeds were in his old ice chest.
sentences.chinese: 而我们的“雪种子”就在他的老式冰柜里。

sentences.english: Taking a bottle of iced water from the fridge, I plonked myself down in the shade under a plane tree.
sentences.chinese: 从冰柜里取了一瓶冷冻水后，我在树荫里坐下来休息。

sentences.english: It also had a freezer and refrigerator, a convenience no other vehicle offered.
sentences.chinese: 它还有一个冰柜和冰箱，这是其它飞行器所没有的。

sentences.english: Tens of thousands of household fridges and freezers without power.
sentences.chinese: 上万台冰箱和冰柜停止工作。

sentences.english: How could you not want to drive around on your favorite beverage cooler?
sentences.chinese: 你怎能不想驾驶着你心爱的饮料冰柜四处兜风？

sentences.english: The ice cabinet is only limited to store the molding raw material sweetmeat cores.
sentences.chinese: 所述冰柜只限存放成型原料甜品芯。

sentences.english: Ready-meals in the fridge always come handy when making bentos ;
sentences.chinese: 冰柜里的速食食品总是很方便，尤其是放在便当里。
